name: Trailblazer
text: If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit, you may move up to 4 spaces in a straight line to a space not adjacent to an enemy unit.

name: Hit and Run
text:
Cannot attack if you are adjacent to an enemy unit.
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: You may fast travel, if able.

name: Keep the Distance
text:
Cannot attack if you are adjacent to an enemy unit.
Target a hero in range.
After the attack: You may fast travel within the same zone, if able.

name: Snap Shot
text:
-2 ::range:: Range for every unit adjacent to the target, including you.
Target a hero in range, or a minion adjacent to you and in range.
_(If your range is below 1, you cannot perform this action.)_

name: Opportunity Shot
text:
-2 ::range:: Range for every unit adjacent to the target, including you.
Target a unit in range.

name: Clear Shot
text:
-2 ::range:: Range for every unit adjacent to the target, including you.
Target a unit in range.

name: Long Shot
text: Target a unit at maximum range.

name: Rain of Arrows
text:
Target a unit at maximum range.
If you target a hero, may repeat up to two times on different heroes.

name: Disorient
text:
Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 1 space.
If you do, move up to that number of spaces in a straight line.

name: Divert Attenion
text:
Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 2 spaces.
If you do, move up to that number of spaces in a straight line.

name: Lead Astray
text:
Move an enemy unit adjacent to you up to 3 spaces.
If you do, move up to that number of spaces in a straight line.

name: Fae Healing
text: If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit, another hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Nature's Blessing
text: If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit, you and up to one hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Grasping Roots
text: **This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius adjacent to terrain cannot fast travel, or move more than 1 space with a movement action.

name: Entangling Vines
text: **This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius adjacent to terrain, or to a friendly hero of theirs, cannot fast travel, or move more than 1 space with a movement action.

name: Grappling Branches
text: **This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius adjacent to terrain, or to a friendly hero of theirs, cannot fast travel, or move more than 1 space with a movement action.

name: Warning Shot
text: If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit, **End of turn:** An enemy hero in radius discards a card, if able.

name: Treetop Sentinel
text: If you are not adjacent to an enemy unit, **End of turn:** An enemy hero in radius discards a card, or is defeated.

name: Wild Hunt
text: Each time before you perform an action, you may move 2 spaces in a straight line.
